inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Wegener's granulomatosis or microscopic polyangiitis, using criteria adapted by EUVAS from the disease definitions of the Chapel Hill consensus conference
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: documented positive serum MPO-ANCA in his medical record

inclusion.criterion: Biopsy proven, pauci-immune, necrotising and/or crescentic glomerulonephritis, in the absence of other defined glomerulopathy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Transbronchial biopsy revealed necrotic granulomas with multinucleated giant cells

inclusion.criterion: Severe renal impairment defined by: (i) oliguria (<400ml/24hr), or (ii) intention to commence dialysis within 48 hours of admission, and (iii) creatinine >500umol/l (5.8mg/dl)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4 since the beginning of his disease

exclusion.criterion: Inadequate contraception in women of child-bearing age
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 57-year-old man with Wegener's granulomatosis, severe renal impairment, and positive serum MPO-ANCA. He is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides.
